FTCS:
<!-- java_eWebEditProPath is set in the java that calls this -->

    <SCRIPT LANGUAGE="JavaScript1.2">
    <!--
    with (eWebEditPro.parameters) {
            // Remove some unneeded buttons to simplify the toolbar.
            window.eWebEditProUnloadHandled = true; // don't prompt to save on unload
            eWebEditProMessages.elementNotFoundMessage = ""; // loading manually, prevent missing element warning
    }
    
    eWebEditPro.parameters.options = "<options><filter on-get='clean-html'></filter></options>";
    
    

    
    function isEdited(name) {
        return document.getElementById(name).className != 'editBox';
    }
                                 
    function disableEditProButtons(assetid)
    {
        for (i=0; i<document.all.tags("button").length; i++) {
            if (document.all.tags("button").item(i).className != "textedit") {
                continue; // skip it
            }
                        
            var name = document.all.tags("button")[i].name;
            var id = name.split(":")[1];
            
            if (assetid == id) {
                var buttonObj = document.all.tags("button")[i];
                // buttonObj.style.backgroundImage = 'url("/Xcelerate/graphics/common/icon/warndeadlock.gif")'; 
                buttonObj.onclick = "";
                // buttonObj.title = "";
                document.all.tags("button")[i].style.visibility = 'hidden';
            }
        }
    }

    //-->
    </SCRIPT>
